item.title: Generating Word Cloud from Bengali Text using Python
item.description: Bengali wordcloud Introduction Word cloud is a visual representation of a set of words. It is a useful tool for understanding the frequency of words in a body of text. Word clouds are often used to describe the contents of a dataset in various NLP related projects. In this tutorial, we will generate a word cloud from a Bengali dataset using wordcloud library in python. We will be working with a dataset consists of Wikipedia articles, most commonly known as the Wikipedia Dataset.
